price: Ni jedhes: "(Qur'aanni) kun falfala (nama biraa) irraa waraabame qofa.
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: faqāla in hādhā illā siḥ'run yu'tharu
